状態マシン: (じょうたいマシン) - state machine

状況によって: (じょうきょうによって) - depending on the situation; depending on circumstances

状況に依る: (じょうきょうによる) - depending on the situation; depending on the circumstances

狂: (hoje/vir) - lunatic , (some type of) enthusiast; somebody possessed of a (certain kind of) mental abnormality
狂い咲く: (くるいざく) - to bloom out of season
狂い回る: (くるいまわる) - to rave; to run amok (amuck)
狂い死に: (くるいじに) - death in madness; dying insane
狂う: (kuruu) - to go mad, to lose one's mind, to go crazy, to go insane; to get out of order, to go amiss, to malfunction, to become imprecise , to go mad, to lose one's mind, to go crazy, to go insane; to get out of order, to go amiss, to malfunction, to become imprecise; to go wrong (de um plano ou expectativa, etc.), to fall through, to get mixed up; to go crazy (over someone or something), to get enthusiastic, to go wild
狂おしい思い: (くるおしいおもい) - maddening thought
狂する: (きょうする) - to go mad (over something); to be crazy (about something)
狂れる: (ふれる) - (usu. as 気がふれる) to go mad
狂わす: (くるわす) - to drive mad/to make insane; to cause a malfunction/to put out of order/to throw out of kilter; to derail (a plan, etc.)
狂わせる: (くるわせる) - to drive mad; to cause a malfunction/to put out of order; to derail (a plan, etc.)
狂乱物価: (きょうらんぶっか) - soaring prices; wild price spiral
狂句: (きょうく) - type of comic haiku
狂喜乱舞: (きょうきらんぶ) - (yoji) boisterous dance; dancing wildly
狂奔: (きょうほん) - rushing around; running wild
狂宴: (きょうえん) - revelry; tumultuous party; wild party; uproarious banquet
狂悖: (きょうはい) - conduct that is immoral and lacking in common sense
狂態: (きょうたい) - disgraceful behavior; disgraceful behaviour
狂気のさた: (きょうきのさた) - crazy deed; unbelievable deed; the height of madness; act of sheer madness
狂気の沙汰: (きょうきのさた) - crazy deed; unbelievable deed; the height of madness; act of sheer madness
狂瀾怒涛: (きょうらんどとう) - (yoji) maelstrom; the state of affairs being in great turmoil
狂熱: (きょうねつ) - extreme passion; wild enthusiasm
狂牛病: (きょうぎゅうびょう) - bovine spongiform encephalopathy; BSE; mad cow disease
狂犬病: (きょうけんびょう) - rabies; hydrophobia
狂者: (きょうしゃ) - insane person; a fanatic
狂言: (きょうげん) - kyogen/farce presented between noh plays or during the interlude of a noh play; kabuki play/kabuki performance; make-believe/ruse/trick
狂言作者: (きょうげんさくしゃ) - house playwright (of kabuki)
狂言回し: (きょうげんまわし) - supporting, but indispensable role; major supporting role
狂言座: (きょうげんざ) - (where the interlude kyogen actors wait)  place on bridge passageway next to the rear of a noh stage
狂言廻し: (きょうげんまわし) - supporting, but indispensable role; major supporting role
狂言強盗: (きょうげんごうとう) - (yoji) fake (staged) robbery
狂言方: (きょうげんかた) - kyogen performer; low-ranked house playwright (of kabuki)
狂言綺語: (きょうげんきぎょ) - (yoji) make-believe fiction
狂言自殺: (きょうげんじさつ) - (yoji) faked suicide; sham suicide; pseudocide
狂言誘拐: (きょうげんゆうかい) - (yoji) fake (staged) kidnapping
狂詩: (きょうし) - (Edo-period) type of humorous poem (humourous)
狆がくしゃみをしたよう: (ちんがくしゃみをしたよう) - (joc) crumpled up (of a face; like the face of a Japanese spaniel while it's sneezing)

狆くしゃ: (ちんくしゃ) - pug-nosed face; person with a pug-nosed face
狆穴子: (チンアナゴ) - spotted garden eel (Heteroconger hassi)
狎れる: (なれる) - to get too familiar with; to become too familiar with
狐: (こ) - Fox , fox (especialmente a raposa-vermelha, Vulpes vulpes); fox (i.e. a sly person); soba or udon topped with deep-fried tofu
狐うどん: (キツネうどん) - udon with deep-fried tofu
狐が落ちる: (きつねがおちる) - to cease being possessed (by the spirit of a fox); to be released from the grasp of the fox spirit; to be exorcised from the fox spirit

狐につままれる: (きつねにつままれる) - to be bewitched by a fox; to be confused
狐に化かされる: (きつねにばかされる) - to be deceived by a fox
狐に小豆飯: (きつねにあずきめし) - risky thing to do (like feeding a fox)
狐に抓まれる: (きつねにつままれる) - to be bewitched by a fox; to be confused
狐に摘まれる: (きつねにつままれる) - to be bewitched by a fox; to be confused
